DOC.brief_summary: The purpose phase II , randomize , open-label clinical trial study 2 schedule single-agent Irinotecan woman metastatic breast cancer experience failure prior therapy anthracycline , taxane , capecitabine . Patients receive Irinotecan capsule either day 5 day , day 14 day 3 week cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Irinotecan Patients With Advanced Metastatic Breast Cancer Who Have Experienced Failure Anthracycline , Taxane , Capecitabine
DOC.criteria: Women diagnosis primary adenocarcinoma breast Presence locally advance metastatic disease nonamenable surgery radiation therapy curative intent At least one measurable lesion > 20mm ( > 10 mm spiral CT scan ) Must receive ( fail ) prior treatment anthracycline , taxane , capecitabine adjuvant and/or advance disease treatment set Women least 18 year old , performance status 02 Prior treatment another topoisomerase I inhibitor Current enrollment another clinical trial
